title: Gifting Service Down?
body: My client currently says Gifting is temporarily unavailable.  Was there an announcement or post I missed on when it might be back up?  Thanks!

replies.body: I don't currently see any issues with gifting.  If you're on the updated client, keep in mind that feature isn't available yet so you'll need to do it on the legacy client.  Let me know if that clears things up!
I'm on the updated client.  That must be what the issue was.  Thanks Porocles.
